description: Runs the workflow when an n8n generated webchat is submitted

properties_schema.name: public
properties_schema.description: Whether the chat should be publicly available or only accessible through the manual chat interface

options.name: Hosted Chat
options.description: Chat on a page served by n8n

options.name: Embedded Chat
options.description: Chat through a widget embedded in another page, or by calling a webhook

properties_schema.displayName: Chat will be live at the URL above once you activate this workflow. Live executions will show up in the â€˜executionsâ€™ tab
properties_schema.name: hostedChatNotice

properties_schema.displayName: Follow the instructions here to embed chat in a webpage (or just call the webhook URL at the top of this section). Chat will be live once you activate this workflow
properties_schema.name: embeddedChatNotice

options.name: Basic Auth
options.description: Simple username and password (the same one for all users)

options.name: n8n User Auth
options.description: Require user to be logged in with their n8n account

properties_schema.name: initialMessages
properties_schema.default:
Hi there! ðŸ‘‹
My name is Nathan. How can I assist you today?
properties_schema.description: Default messages shown at the start of the chat, one per line

options.name: allowFileUploads
options.description: Whether to allow file uploads in the chat

options.name: allowedFilesMimeTypes
options.description: Allowed file types for upload. Comma-separated list of MIME types.

options.name: allowedOrigins
options.description: Comma-separated list of URLs allowed for cross-origin non-preflight requests. Use * (default) to allow all origins.

options.name: allowFileUploads
options.description: Whether to allow file uploads in the chat

options.name: allowedFilesMimeTypes
options.description: Allowed file types for upload. Comma-separated list of MIME types.

options.name: inputPlaceholder
options.description: Shown as placeholder text in the chat input field

options.name: loadPreviousSession
Off
options.description: Loading messages of previous session is turned off

options.name: From Memory
options.description: Load session messages from memory

options.name: Manually
options.description: Manually return messages of session
If loading messages of a previous session should be enabled

options.name: responseMode
When Last Node Finishes
options.description: Returns data of the last-executed node

options.name: Using 'Respond to Webhook' Node
options.description: Response defined in that node
When and how to respond to the webhook

options.displayName: Require Button Click to Start Chat
options.name: showWelcomeScreen
options.description: Whether to show the welcome screen at the start of the chat

options.name: getStarted
options.description: Shown as part of the welcome screen, in the middle of the chat window

options.name: subtitle
options.default: Start a chat. We're here to help you 24/7.
options.description: Shown at the top of the chat, under the title

options.name: title
options.description: Shown at the top of the chat

options.name: customCss
options.description: Override default styling of the public chat interface with CSS
